name: Navajo Code Talker Terminal
description:
Learn how the Navajo Code Talkers used the Navajo language to encode and decode messages during World War II in this informational program. Hover over colored text to see translations to and from Navajo, and test out your skills by decoding messages!

A short little experience made in 2 weeks as a terminal-only app using tcell for a showcase, then adapted for web through WebAssembly. If nothing seems to be happening, the program might be expecting you to type something! It's basically an interactive slideshow, not really a game, but yeah :)
